name: claudemeter
description: Complete Claude.ai account monitoring: session limits, weekly limits, token usage, reset times, and spending caps. Track all Claude Code and Claude Pro/Max plan quotas in real-time from your status bar.

claudemeter.fetchOnStartup.description: Automatically fetch usage data when VS Code starts

claudemeter.headless.description: Run browser in headless (hidden) mode. Browser will show automatically if login is needed.

claudemeter.autoRefreshMinutes.description: Auto-refresh interval in minutes for checking Claude.ai usage and session token data (1-60 minutes)

enumDescriptions: Full display: Claude Se 13% ⏱ 11:59  Wk 11% ⏱ Fri 11  Tk 36%
Percentages only: Claude Se 13%  Wk 11%  Tk 36%
Single compact panel: Claude S-13% Wk-11% Tk-36%
claudemeter.statusBar.displayMode.markdownDescription:
Status bar display mode:
- **default**: Full display with reset times (separate panels)
- **minimal**: Percentages only (separate panels)
- **compact**: All metrics in a single panel

claudemeter.statusBar.showSonnet.description: Show Sonnet weekly usage in status bar (default/minimal modes only)

claudemeter.statusBar.showOpus.description: Show Opus weekly usage in status bar (Max plans only, default/minimal modes)

claudemeter.statusBar.showCredits.description: Show extra usage (spending cap) in status bar (default/minimal modes only)

claudemeter.thresholds.warning.description: Usage percentage to show warning (yellow) indicator

claudemeter.thresholds.error.description: Usage percentage to show error (red) indicator

claudemeter.debug.description: Enable debug logging to output channel (for troubleshooting)

claudemeter.tokenLimit.description: Context window token limit (200,000 default for Claude models)

claudemeter.tokenOnlyMode.description: Token-only mode: Only track Claude Code tokens, skip Claude.ai web usage scraping entirely

claudemeter.debugLogFile.description: Path to debug log file. Auto-populated on first run. Supports ~ for home directory.

claudemeter.debugLogMaxSizeKB.description: Maximum debug log file size in KB. Oldest entries are trimmed when exceeded (64-2048 KB, default 256 KB)
